thread.title: Jannah Place Abu Dhabi switches to eco-friendly amenities
thread.title_full: Jannah Place Abu Dhabi switches to eco-friendly amenities | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Jannah Place Abu Dhabi switches to eco-friendly amenities
text:
(MENAFN Press) Jannah Place Hotel Abu Dhabi has implemented the usage of environmental friendly bathroom amenities to promote health and wellbeing in UAE.

"All the products are made out of eco-friendly and recyclable materials," CEO of the group Mr. Nehme Imad Darwiche stated.
The purpose of implementing the usage of these products is to fulfill the social responsibility and ensure the safety and comfort of our first-class guests. 

"It is our responsibility to ensure the convenience of our first-class guests as well as having to play our part in preserving the environment,"

He further added, "Across all our hotels, guests enjoy our responsibility towards receiving high end services in a first class environment". 

About Jannah Place Abu Dhabi 
Jannah Place Abu Dhabi
